name: projetofleye
description: Web application for CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on users, developed using Node.js and PostgreSQL. Users can create, view, update, and delete user records through an Express.js server and PostgreSQL database. The application features endpoints for data manipulation, a simple user interface for interaction, and deployment on an online server for internet access.
author: Daniel Pablo Mesquita de Sousa Junior
